line.comment: * SHIP REPAIR SLAVES : ASTRONAUT COMMAND -by- MISTER BEAR v1.10 Jan-2011
* ARGUMENT 1 : [ship] oTargetShip - ship to be repaired
* ARGUMENT 2 : [int] iDebug 1: Just target info menu 2: Subtitle messages as well
* Scale distances and timeouts based on target size
* Reduce chance of a reposition by object class
* DEBUG Inform user of target details

line.text: add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu item to array

line.comment: * Choose whether to WAIT or MOVE AROUND
* Move around randomly for a few seconds
* MOVE TO SHIP : Move the astronaut to the ship
* PARAM : [int] iMaximumDistance : Minimum firing distance from 'oTargetShip'
* Move to within the minimum distance for whatever size ship this is
* REPAIR HULL : Create the illusion of a greater repair impact by artificially increasing hull strength

sval.val: SHIP REPAIR SLAVES : ASTRONAUT COMMAND -by- MISTER BEAR v1.10 Jan-2011
ARGUMENT 1 : [ship] oTargetShip - ship to be repaired
ARGUMENT 2 : [int] iDebug 1: Just target info menu 2: Subtitle messages as well
Scale distances and timeouts based on target size
Reduce chance of a reposition by object class
DEBUG Inform user of target details
Choose whether to WAIT or MOVE AROUND
Move around randomly for a few seconds
MOVE TO SHIP : Move the astronaut to the ship
PARAM : [int] iMaximumDistance : Minimum firing distance from 'oTargetShip'
Move to within the minimum distance for whatever size ship this is
REPAIR HULL : Create the illusion of a greater repair impact by artificially increasing hull strength
